TextEquiv.Unicode: QUEST√ÉO 40 DISCURSIVA: (Valor 10 pontos) You are an Executive Secretary at an international company. You are in charge of taking messages most of the time. You have finished your work, but your manager hasn't arrived from a meeting. Leave him a message, with the information of phone calls received from Valentina (office workmate), about car and from wife about buying milk and daughter school pick up.
